title: Grab bag! On the floor at HumanX
description: Today’s episode is a roundup of spontaneous, on-the-ground conversations from HumanX 2025, featuring guests from CodeConductor, DDN, Cloudflare, and Galileo.
author: Eira May
excerpt: Paul Dhaliwal is the founder and CEO of CodeConductor.
text: Paul Dhaliwal is the founder and CEO of CodeConductor.Priya Joseph is the AI field CEO at DDN.Lizzie Siegle is a developer advocate at Cloudflare.Erin Mikail Staples is a developer experience engineer at Galileo.This episode was recorded at HumanX last month. Next year’s event will be April 6-9, 2026 in San Francisco. Register today!TRANSCRIPT
html:
Paul Dhaliwal is the founder and CEO of CodeConductor.

Priya Joseph is the AI field CEO at DDN.

Lizzie Siegle is a developer advocate at Cloudflare.

Erin Mikail Staples is a developer experience engineer at Galileo.

This episode was recorded at HumanX last month. Next year’s event will be April 6-9, 2026 in San Francisco. Register today!

TRANSCRIPT
